headline: Byte-Sized AI: Visa and Mastercard Link With AI Giants on Promise of Agentic
summary: Skechers is using an in-person AI assistant in Singapore; Oracle has launched AI-powered trade management functions for logistics and more.

headline: Mastercard (NYSE:MA) Reports Strong Earnings As New Crypto Card Partnership Announced
summary: Mastercard (NYSE:MA) announced a significant partnership with Bankees Foundation to issue crypto-rechargeable prepaid cards in numerous regions, excluding the U.S. and Japan, which has piqued investor interest. Alongside the release of positive first-quarter earnings on May 1, 2025, showcasing a rise in sales and net income, Mastercard's price saw an increase of 2%, aligning with broader market optimism. The market's surge driven by strong employment data and potential tariff relief...
